page.title: 08EDUCATION OF THE CHILDREN.
page.content: By North Yorkshire County Council. All education is provided outside the Dale,of the 11 children in the area 3 below school age. 5 attend Primary School_Middleham C.E. 1 " Secondary " _Wensleydale Comp 2 receiving Futher Education. The Local Authority provides a free private bus/taxi service daily for the Primary & Sec.pupils leaving 8.15am returning primary 3.40 sec. 4.15pm. As all pupils are away all day they have the choice of providing their own packed lunch or using the Education Catering Service. Primary _ 2 course set meal 67p daily Secondary _Choice of Menu all dishes individually priced. Sausage beans & chips 55p Fruit pie & custard 24p Fruit drink 14p
